dhp44-59:44: Ko imaṁ pathaviṁ vicessati,Yamalokañca imaṁ sadevakaṁ;Ko dhammapadaṁ sudesitaṁ,Kusalo pupphamiva pacessati.
dhp44-59:45: Sekho pathaviṁ vicessati,Yamalokañca imaṁ sadevakaṁ;Sekho dhammapadaṁ sudesitaṁ,Kusalo pupphamiva pacessati.
dhp44-59:46: Pheṇūpamaṁ kāyamimaṁ viditvā,Marīcidhammaṁ abhisambudhāno;Chetvāna mārassa papupphakāni,Adassanaṁ maccurājassa gacche.
dhp44-59:47: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṁ,byāsattamanasaṁ naraṁ;Suttaṁ gāmaṁ mahoghova,maccu ādāya gacchati.
dhp44-59:48: Pupphāni heva pacinantaṁ,byāsattamanasaṁ naraṁ;Atittaññeva kāmesu,antako kurute vasaṁ.
dhp44-59:49: Yathāpi bhamaro pupphaṁ,vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṁ;Paleti rasamādāya,evaṁ gāme munī care.
dhp44-59:50: Na paresaṁ vilomāni,na paresaṁ katākataṁ;Attanova avekkheyya,katāni akatāni ca.
dhp44-59:51: Yathāpi ruciraṁ pupphaṁ,vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ;Evaṁ subhāsitā vācā,aphalā hoti akubbato.
dhp44-59:52: Yathāpi ruciraṁ pupphaṁ,Vaṇṇavantaṁ sagandhakaṁ;Evaṁ subhāsitā vācā,Saphalā hoti kubbato.
dhp44-59:53: Yathāpi puppharāsimhā,kayirā mālāguṇe bahū;Evaṁ jātena maccena,kattabbaṁ kusalaṁ bahuṁ.
dhp44-59:54: Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti,Na candanaṁ tagaramallikā vā;Satañca gandho paṭivātameti,Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
dhp44-59:55: Candanaṁ tagaraṁ vāpi,uppalaṁ atha vassikī;Etesaṁ gandhajātānaṁ,sīlagandho anuttaro.
dhp44-59:56: Appamatto ayaṁ gandho,yāyaṁ tagaracandanī;Yo ca sīlavataṁ gandho,vāti devesu uttamo.
dhp44-59:58: Yathā saṅkāradhānasmiṁ,ujjhitasmiṁ mahāpathe;Padumaṁ tattha jāyetha,sucigandhaṁ manoramaṁ.
